placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
context: Use in context of: Путешествие во Францию — от 18 636 ₽ этим летом!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This destination image will visually represent French cuisine and culture, featuring an elegant table setting with French delicacies and wine, emphasizing gastronomy.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
